Instruction: Brown the sausage in a large skillet over medium-high heat until cooked through. Remove excess fat and set the cooked sausage aside.
Cook sausage in a large skillet over medium-high heat until browned. Drain and set aside.
Incorporate the cooked sausage, cheese, and tomatoes into the mixture. Cook for 3 to 5 minutes, stirring frequently until the cheese is melted.
To increase the spice level of the dip, incorporate finely chopped jalapeño peppers into the mixture or use sliced jalapeños as a garnish.
